name: AMO bring back favorites and collections
description:
NOTE: DOES NOT WORK WITH WEBEXTENSIONS LIKE STYLUS! WebExtensions are not allowed to run on AMO!

Mozilla made this dumb move to remove the favorites and collections buttons from the add-on detail pages, because "they're not used very often". This userstyle reverts this dumb move and brings back the buttons where they belong.
additional_info:
NOTE: To use this in Firefox 57+, see below.

This is from "AMO EZ on the eyes", but I don't like the style changes, so I created an extra stylesheet. https://userstyles.org/styles/126536/amo-ez-on-the-eyes

Firefox 57:
1. Create a new boolean in about:config with the name "privacy.resistFingerprinting.block_mozAddonManager" and set it to true
2. Create a file "userContent.css" in your Firefox profile folder (about:support -> open folder) in the subfolder "chrome" (e.g. firefoxprofile/chrome/userContent.css) and paste the style there without the namespace part (but keep the moz-document part!)
